The prices quoted in active markets are the prices quoted in the market for the same asset or liability. The prices quoted in the market for an asset or liability are measured by the financial instruments that are traded in active markets. If the asset or liability is not traded in an active market, the prices quoted in the market are used to calculate the fair value.
